vsParam: Ru

Even this small piece contains so much magic power.
Anise Hyssop

Sure enough... After all, just a piece of it
caused a space-time distortion...
Peppermint

H-hey, if a scale is so powerful... I think
the dragon's magic power is even more horrible?
We'd better just quit...
We will figure out a way!
Mimi

Hey, what are you talking about?!
You forgot what I said!?
Peppermint

N-not like that! [px] tends to break the ice
in that way?! Right!?
Anise Hyssop

We will definitely find a way to take down that dragon.
And we may find a breakthrough if we work together.
Mimi

Yeah, right. But it's not "will definitely find a way".
Instead, we "have got to find a way".
Peppermint
Yeah! Let's work out a plan to defeat that dragon!
Ru

To defeat that dragon, the biggest problem remains...
its overwhelming magic power.
Ru

That [px]'s items didn't work may be due to
the magic power that protects it.
Peppermint

Plus, it could even create a space-time distortion,
from which a monster came out...
Sorel

We don't stand a chance... if we need to deal with
the dragon and all other monsters at the same time.
Sterk

Um... We have to seal the dragon's magic power
before fighting against it.
Sorel
Hmm... Is there a way to do that...
Peppermint

Ah! If the problem is its magic power,
maybe His Majesty could provide useful information!
Sterk

The Fairy King?
Oh, I see. You're a fairy too...
Sterk

Um...
You are a fairy, aren't you?
Peppermint

Yeah, I am a fairy!
Look, this pair of wings could prove that perfectly!
Anise Hyssop

Anyway, we may find something from Lord Thunbergia.

Mimi
